description.line1: Discover your character through 12 psychological questions.
description.line2: Find your hidden personality right now.

mainDescription.line1: From personality tests to character tournaments!

student.name: Sarah Kim
student.content: I discovered aspects of my personality I never knew!

worker.name: John Lee
worker.content: Matching with AoT characters makes it more fun

q2.question: Can I share my results?
q2.answer: Yes, easily share via social media.

q3.question: Is my data safe?
q3.answer: All data is processed anonymously and not stored.

q1.question: When you have free time on weekends, you:
q1.option1: Meet friends or join gatherings with new people
q1.option2: Spend time quietly at home reading or watching movies

q2.question: At parties or gatherings, you:
q2.option1: Chat with many people and easily make new friends
q2.option2: Have deep conversations only with a few close people

q3.question: To recharge your energy, you:
q3.option1: Spend active time socializing with people

q4.question: When learning something new, you prefer:
q4.option1: Learning through concrete examples and practice
q4.option2: Understanding overall concepts and theories first

q6.question: When solving problems, you:
q6.option1: Use proven methods and past experience
q6.option2: Try new methods and innovative approaches

q8.question: When a friend asks for advice, you:
q8.option1: Analyze the problem and suggest solutions

q9.question: When receiving criticism, you first:
q9.option1: Evaluate the logical validity of the criticism
q9.option2: Consider the person's intent and your feelings

q10.question: When traveling, you:
q10.option1: Make detailed plans and schedules in advance
q10.option2: Make rough plans and move spontaneously

q11.question: When working on tasks, you prefer:

sharing.title: Share Your Results
sharing.description: Share and compare results with your friends

share.kakaoTitle: My Attack on Titan character is {{characterName}}!
share.nativeText: My Attack on Titan character is {{characterName}} ({{mbtiType}})!

INTJ.name: Levi Ackerman
INTJ.title: The Architect
INTJ.description: Humanity's strongest soldier with exceptional combat skills and cold judgment. Values comrades despite not showing emotions.
INTJ.quote: Make a choice you won't regret

INTP.name: Hange Zoe
INTP.title: The Thinker
INTP.description: Survey Corps squad leader with infinite curiosity about Titans. Pursues truth despite dangers.

ENTJ.name: Erwin Smith
ENTJ.title: The Commander
ENTJ.description: Survey Corps commander who risks everything for humanity's future. Sees the big picture and accepts sacrifice.

ENTP.name: Floch Forster
ENTP.title: The Debater
ENTP.description: Fearless in debate for his beliefs. Challenges the existing order.
ENTP.quote: If we need a devil, I'll gladly become one

INFJ.name: Armin Arlert
INFJ.title: The Advocate
INFJ.description: Possesses brilliant strategic thinking and deep insight. Seeks peace but accepts sacrifice when necessary.
INFJ.quote: To change something, you have to give up something

INFP.name: Historia Reiss
INFP.title: The Mediator
INFP.description: On a journey to find her true self. Cares for others while maintaining her beliefs.
INFP.quote: I'm humanity's enemy, but I'm your ally

ENFJ.name: Marco Bott
ENFJ.title: The Protagonist
ENFJ.description: Passionate about helping and leading others. Has the power to unite everyone.
ENFJ.quote: If only everyone could understand each other

ENFP.name: Sasha Blouse
ENFP.title: The Campaigner
ENFP.description: Brightens surroundings with positive energy. A free spirit.
ENFP.quote: Meat... I want to eat meat

ISTJ.name: Mikasa Ackerman
ISTJ.title: The Logistician
ISTJ.description: Strong sense of duty and loyalty. Will do anything to protect loved ones.
ISTJ.quote: This world is cruel. But it's also beautiful

ISFJ.name: Petra Ral
ISFJ.title: The Defender
ISFJ.description: Dedicated person who cares for and supports teammates. Quietly backs up the team.
ISFJ.quote: We have to trust each other

ESTJ.name: Jean Kirstein
ESTJ.title: The Executive
ESTJ.description: Grown into a realistic and responsible leader. Values principles and leads the team.

ESFJ.name: Connie Springer
ESFJ.title: The Consul
ESFJ.description: Strong camaraderie and values teamwork. Never loses humor even in difficult situations.

ISTP.name: Annie Leonhart
ISTP.title: The Virtuoso
ISTP.description: Exceptional combat skills and cool judgment. Independent and practical.

ISFP.name: Ymir
ISFP.title: The Adventurer
ISFP.description: Free and independent soul. Acts according to personal values.
ISFP.quote: I'm going to live for myself

ESTP.name: Eren Yeager
ESTP.title: The Entrepreneur
ESTP.description: Exceptional action and determination. Fights with everything for freedom.

ESFP.name: Connie Springer
ESFP.title: The Entertainer
ESFP.description: Brightens the atmosphere with cheerful personality. Lives in the moment.
ESFP.quote: Let's laugh! Everything works out when you laugh!

sharing.title: Share Your Champion
sharing.kakaoDescription: {{characterName}} ({{mbtiType}}) won the Attack on Titan Character Tournament!

egenTest.title: Egen/Teto Personality Test
egenTest.subtitle: Find your dating style through Attack on Titan characters

q1.question: Your dating style is?
q1.option2: Spending natural and comfortable time together

q2.question: When expressing feelings to your partner

q3.question: When conflicts arise with your partner
q3.option1: Try to resolve immediately through conversation

egenMale.title: Egen Male
egenMale.description: Passionate and direct dating style! You're like Eren, going all-in for love.

tetoMale.title: Teto Male
tetoMale.description: Cool and independent dating style! You're like Levi, keeping your own pace.

egenFemale.title: Egen Female
egenFemale.description: Pure and devoted dating style! You're like Historia, loving with all your heart.

tetoFemale.title: Teto Female
tetoFemale.description: Independent and mysterious dating style! You're like Annie, with your unique charm.

romanceTest.title: Attack on Titan Romance Style Test
romanceTest.subtitle: Based on canon relationships

q1.question: What's most important in a relationship?

q2.question: How do you resolve conflicts?
q2.option3: Try to understand each other's position

q5.question: What do you seek in a relationship?

q6.question: What attracts you in a partner?

q7.question: In long-distance or difficult situations?
q7.option1: Wait and protect till the end

q9.question: If separation comes?
q9.option1: Try to hold on till the end

q10.question: Your ideal form of love?
q10.option2: Love based on trust and respect

erenMikasa.title: Eren-Mikasa Type
erenMikasa.subtitle: Destined Bond Type
erenMikasa.description: Deep bond and protective instinct. You want to protect each other but sometimes struggle to express feelings.

leviPetra.title: Levi-Petra Type
leviPetra.subtitle: Trust & Respect Type
leviPetra.description: Deep trust and respect for each other. Cold outside but warm inside.

ymirHistoria.title: Ymir-Historia Type
ymirHistoria.subtitle: Free Love Type
ymirHistoria.description: Showing and accepting true selves. Love purely without social prejudice.
ymirHistoria.quote: I'll live my life for you

jeanPieck.title: Jean-Pieck Type
jeanPieck.subtitle: Mature Understanding Type
jeanPieck.description: Understanding and respecting each other's positions. Trying to understand despite conflicts.

arminAnnie.title: Armin-Annie Type
arminAnnie.subtitle: Intellectual Connection Type
arminAnnie.description: Opening hearts through dialogue and understanding. Deep understanding of inner selves.
arminAnnie.quote: I want to see your true self

sashaNiccolo.title: Sasha-Niccolo Type
sashaNiccolo.subtitle: Pure Joy Type
sashaNiccolo.description: Sharing small daily happiness. Bright love bringing joy and laughter.
sashaNiccolo.quote: Every moment with you is happiness

erwinLevi.title: Erwin-Levi Type
erwinLevi.subtitle: Comrade Bond Type
erwinLevi.description: Moving toward the same goal. Deep trust without words.
erwinLevi.quote: Let's go together till the end

bertholdtAnnie.title: Bertholdt-Annie Type
bertholdtAnnie.subtitle: Silent Devotion Type
bertholdtAnnie.description: Watching and supporting silently. Deep feelings not shown outwardly.
bertholdtAnnie.quote: My feelings won't change even if I can't say

hangeMoblit.title: Hange-Moblit Type
hangeMoblit.subtitle: Passionate Support Type
hangeMoblit.description: One's passion supported by another. Perfectly complementing each other.
hangeMoblit.quote: I'll help you spread your wings

titanQuiz.quitMessage: Your current progress will be saved and you can see your results.
